sentence: The New Yorker: Satire from the Borowitz Report: DeSantis Warns That Math Makes Children Gay TALLAHASSEE (The Borowitz Report)Proposing a sweeping ban on math in Floridas classrooms, Governor Ron DeSantis asserted that the latest research? indicates that math makes children gay.? For years, liberals in the education mafia have brainwashed Americans into thinking that our children should learn to add, subtract, multiply, and divide,? he told reporters.
